definition: digital-to-analog/abbr. for 數字到模擬|数字到模拟
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: A digital-analog PLL is the main part of the data separator.
sentences.chinese: 这个数据分离器的主要部分是一个数模混合的锁相环。

sentences.english: There are instances where a professor recommendation could be useful.
sentences.chinese: 这里有些例子能够数模教授的推荐信能派上用场。

sentences.english: Automatic mapping is a series of transformations of numbers and patterns.
sentences.chinese: 自动化制图过程，就是一系列的数模转换。

sentences.english: This article introduces a digital volume Controller designed by using digital-analog conversion.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍利用数模转换器件设计的数字音量控制器。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new mixed analog-digital algorithm of despreading for CDMA signals is described.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种CDMA扩频信号的数模混合型解扩方法。

sentences.english: The design flow of a mixed-signal circuit is complicated.
sentences.chinese: 数模混合电路的设计流程是比较复杂的。

sentences.english: Design for the low power Digital-Analog conversion.
sentences.chinese: 低功耗数模转换器设计。

sentences.english: PC-DMIS PREMIUM also lets you fully document unknown parts and generate computer models for reverse engineering applications.
sentences.chinese: 软件中生成数模，最终完成逆向工程的应用。

sentences.english: I was surfacing molding of the smooth corner all the times this week, so just let me talk about the recept myself.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期一直在做圆角数模，谈谈我的感受吧。

sentences.english: In this paper, the CMOS chip in design is mainly single-chip-microcomputer and A/D conversion chips.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计采用的芯片主要是单片机和数模转换芯片。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)

pinyin: ji4 suan4 ji1 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4
